resources:
Covid Care check the phone number Proxim is active Proxim is not active You need to enable Bluetooth to make Proxim work correctly You need to enable Location Services to make Proxim work correctly You need to disable Battery Saver to make Proxim work correctly Application is paused. Don\'t forget to resume it. Resume Application is running and anonymously monitoring nearby phones. Pause Enable Bluetooth Enable Location Services Disable Battery Saver Background service Important notifications Help Back to app Enable Bluetooth Enable Enable Bluetooth With Bluetooth disabled, Proxim cannot create a list of nearby phones.\n\nEnable it by pressing \"Enable Bluetooth\". Enable Location Services Even though we don\'t use Location data, enable them in order for Bluetooth to work properly by using the button \"Enable Location Service\". Enable Location Services Enable Bluetooth and Location Services With Bluetooth and Location Services disabled, Proxim cannot create a list of phones nearby.\n\nEven though we don\'t use Location data, please enable both services in order for Bluetooth to work properly by using the button \u201cEnable BT and Location Services\". Enable BT and Location Services Proxim is active Proxim is paused Application is running in the background and monitoring the surroundings. Please do not force stop the application. Keep Bluetooth enabled and use your phone as usual. Application is now paused and is not collecting any data about your surroundings.\n\nEnable data collection and keep yourself and others safe. Don\'t forget to do that especially when leaving your home. UltraLow Low Medium High Low Power Balanced Low Latency In case you are tested positive, we will contact you using your phone number %s. We will ask you to send us an anonymised list of phones which can be found under My data. Pause Proxim Start Proxim Your device does not support Bluetooth LE Proxim needs Bluetooth to function properly Bluetooth is part of Location Services. That\'s why we ask for permission to use Location tracking after you press \"Enable\". Confirm both requests so that the application can function properly. You are the only one who can upload the collected data, and only when asked to do so by a public health officer. You don\'t have to worry: the application is not tracking your location nor does it save it. Permissions Phone number Enter your phone number that will be used by a public health officer only when somebody from your surroundings has tested positive for coronavirus. I agree that the Ministry of Health can use this phone number and the collected data about meeting other application users to carry our epidemiological investigation. Phone number (mandatory) Continue Verification code Invalid phone number (must contain country prefix) Verification code was not entered correctly. Error contacting server. Check network connection. Too many phone number verification requests. You can try again in a couple of hours. You cannot use this number.\nPhone number %1$s cannot be used because you have used it for activation on a different device. Verification code has expired. Check phone number and request a new verification code. Help My data This is a list of signal measurements of nearby phones with Proxim in the past %d days. Data does not contain coordinates nor any other personal data. You are the only one who can send the data to the public health officers. All Close encounters Date Time ID RSSI Tx Power Distance About app This application was created under the Covid19CZ initiative. We have developed it with focus on privacy protection so that we wanted to use it ourselves as well. Your data is stored only on your device and your location history cannot be determined from it. Thank you for using the application and we believe that together we will overcome this epidemic.\n\nProxim team The permission for location tracking needs to be granted to allow the application work properly. You can find more information on Android Developer\'s Site https://developer.android.com/guide/topics/connectivity/bluetooth#Permissions Settings Dismiss How does it work? Continue to activation The application will be monitoring your surroundings continuously and will record all other phones of users with the Proxim application you encounter.

If any of them test positive for coronavirus, a public health officer will call you.

If you test positive, the public health office will contact all the other application users you encountered.

Thanks to Proxim you will keep yourself and others safe Verify Verification code We sent a verification code to phone number %s. Verification code will expire in %1$s. Verification code was automatically filled from the SMS. Contacts Thinking you are positive for coronavirus?\n\nStay home and contact your general practitioner or your local public health office. Do you need advice?

All questions and concerns about coronavirus should be answered on the Ministry\'s website or free phone line %s. Frequently asked questions Important contacts About application Proxim

Do you need help with the application or you want to know how it works? Write Anežka, Proxim support bot. Send data Sent Data was already sent. You can send it again in %d minutes. Were you asked by a public health officer to send a list of phones that you were in contact with?

Enter the 6-digit test report code given to you by the health authorities in the box below. Share application Proxim Share application Hi, I\'m using application Proxim. Install it too and together we can help stop the spread of coronavirus. The application collects anonymous data about nearby phones so that the public health officers can find potentially positive people more easily. The more we are, the better it works. Application can be found at %s. Are you sure you want to delete your collected data?\n\nPublic health officers will lose the possibility to use your contacts in case of you get infected.\n\nAfter deleting your data, Proxim will be automatically paused. Delete all data Delete data Are you sure you want to cancel your phone\'s registration?\n\nAfter cancelling your phone registration we can no longer contact you in case somebody from your surrounding gets tested positive.\n\nIf you are the one who gets tested positive, we will not be able to contact anybody you encountered.\n\nAfter cancelling the registration, all the devices registered with phone number %s will have their application turned off. Are you sure you want to cancel your phone\'s registration?\n\nAfter cancelling your registration, we can no longer contact people with whom you have been in touch.\n\nBy cancelling your registration, only the app on this device will be turned off because you didn\'t verify your phone number. Delete registration About application Yes, send Data upload failed. Please try again later. Your device seems to be offline. Your account doesn\'t exist anymore or you were logged out. All data was deleted and Proxim was paused You successfully uploaded the data. Thank you for helping against the spread of coronavirus.\n\nPlease collaborate with public health officers to find all the people you were in contact with.\n\nStay in quarantine, limit contact with your family, and obey the orders of public health workers. We canceled your phone\'s registration Close Disable Battery Saver Proxim needs to run on the background, but the phone is turning it off to save battery.\n\nDisable Battery Saver by pressing \"Disable Battery Saver\" in the settings. Proxim needs to be active even when you are not using it Your phone is automatically turning off some applications when you are not using them to save battery life. Enable running applications on background in your phone\'s settings. You can find the guide for your phone below. Did you meet several people during the day? Check your phone\'s settings. It is possible that the application is being turned off automatically. Finish activation Application on the background Guide for %s You consent with the conditions of data processing is necessary to activate the application. Without your consent, the application cannot work properly. Continue Guide Unexpected error occurred. Try again later. If the error keeps occurring for a longer period, contact our support. About showed data You didn\'t get SMS with verification code? Start using the application right now and verify your phone later. I\'ll finish the verification later verify phone number Disable Battery Saver manually, please. Please verify your phone number so that we can contact you in case you have been infected. Data collection Here is the history of contacts with other users of Proxim. It doesn\'t indicate infection of the users. Chat with Anežka – Proxim support Anežka – Proxim support // DISCLAIMER START Disclaimer This software provides only forecasts of occupancy of selected places. The actual occupancy and occurence of people at places may differ from these forecasts as they are based on past statistical data. The authors provide no guarantee in any way to the accuracy of these forecasts. This software does not provide or substitute in any way medical or health advice or consultation. I read and understand. Confirm by checking the box Start // DISCLAIMER END ​ // ONBOARDING SLIDE 1 START Welcome We are happy to have you onboard. Let\'s start. How does it work? // ONBOARDING SLIDE 1 END ​ // ONBOARDING SLIDE 2 START Plan your day Based on the data we can predict where and when it\'s more convenient to go. What\'s next? // ONBOARDING SLIDE 2 END ​ // ONBOARDING SLIDE 3 START Avoid the crowds Create a list of your favourite places and go there without worries. Shall I start? // ONBOARDING SLIDE 3 END ​ // ONBOARDING SLIDE 4 START Create your own list The list is empty and it awaits your first favourite place. Add my first place // ONBOARDING SLIDE 4 END ​ // SELECT CATEGORY START Where to Choose one of the supported categories: Pharmacy Grocery Park // SELECT CATEGORY END ​ // SELECT PLACE START Search nearby Add This location is already in your list of favorite places. Do you want to proceed to the list? Yes No // SELECT PLACE END ​ // FAVOURITE PLACES START Plan your day RECOMMENDED TIME Find different place No data Not today // FAVOURITE PLACES END ​ // GRAPH START Timings Low Medium High No data found! Download our data gathering app and help us with our efforts. Download Today Tomorrow Remove ​ // GRAPH END ​ // CUSTOM NAME START Place address You can name your place (optional) Add to favourite places // CUSTOM NAME END ​ ​ // CZ LANG STARTS ​ ​ // DISCLAIMER START Vyloučení odpovědnosti Tento software poskytuje pouze předpovědi obsazenosti vybraných míst. Skutečná obsazenost a výskyt lidí na místech se může od těchto předpovědí lišit, neboť vychází z dřívějších statistických dat. Tento software žádným způsobem neposkytuje a ani nenahrazuje lékařskou ani zdravotní radu nebo konzultaci. Četl jsem a rozumím. Zaškrtnutím potvrďte souhlas Start // DISCLAIMER END ​ // ONBOARDING SLIDE 1 START Vítejte Jsme rádi, že jste s námi. Pusťme se do toho. Jak to funguje? // ONBOARDING SLIDE 1 END ​ // ONBOARDING SLIDE 2 START Plánujte si den Na základě získaných dat můžeme předpovídat, kdy je vhodnější se na daná místa vydat. Co dál? // ONBOARDING SLIDE 2 END // ONBOARDING SLIDE 3 START Navštěvujte místa v klidu Vytvořte si seznam svých oblíbených míst a vyhněte se davům. Už můžu začít? // ONBOARDING SLIDE 3 END // ONBOARDING SLIDE 4 START Vytvořte si vlastní seznam Váš seznam oblíbených míst je zatím prázdný, přidejte první lokalitu. Přidat první místo // ONBOARDING SLIDE 4 END // PLAN YOUR DAY START // PLAN YOUR DAY END ​ // SELECT CATEGORY START Kam jít Vyberte jednu ze zatím podporovaných kategorií: Lékárna Potraviny Park // SELECT CATEGORY END ​ // SELECT PLACE START Hledat v okolí Přidat Toto místo již máte v seznamu oblíbených míst. Chcete přejít k tomuto seznamu? Ano Ne // SELECT PLACE END ​ // FAVOURITE PLACES START Naplánujte si den DOPORUČENÝ ČAS Najít jiné místo Málo dat Lépe zítra // FAVOURITE PLACES END ​ // GRAPH START Timings Nízká Střední Vysoká Data nenalezena! Stáhněte si naši aplikaci FreMEn Explorer a pomozte nám sbírat data! Stáhnout Dnes Zítra Odebrat // GRAPH END ​ // CUSTOM NAME START Adresa místa Pojmenujte si místo (volitelné) Přidat k oblíbeným // CUSTOM NAME END ​ // AR LANG STARTS ​ Covid Combine ​ // DISCLAIMER START إقرار يوفر هذا البرنامج فقط توقعات إشغال أماكن محددة. قد يختلف الإشغال الفعلي ووجود الأشخاص في الأماكن عن هذه التوقعات لأنها تستند إلى بيانات إحصائية سابقة. لا يقدم المؤلفون أي ضمان بأي شكل من الأشكال على دقة هذه التوقعات. لا يوفر هذا البرنامج أو يحل محل أي استشارة أو استشارة طبية أو صحية بأي شكل من الأشكال قرأت وفهمت قم بالموافقة عن طريق الضغط على المربع البدء // DISCLAIMER END ​ // ONBOARDING SLIDE 1 START مرحبا يسعدنا انضمامك الينا .ابدأ كيف يعمل؟ // ONBOARDING SLIDE 1 END ​ // ONBOARDING SLIDE 2 START خطط يومك استناداً الى البيانات يمكننا توقع اين ومتى يكون المكان اكثر ملاءمةً للذهاب ماذا بعد ذلك؟ // ONBOARDING SLIDE 2 END // ONBOARDING SLIDE 3 START تجنب الازدحام قم بإنشاء قائمة بأماكنك المفضلة ثم اذهب اليها من غير قلق هل ابدأ؟ // ONBOARDING SLIDE 3 END // ONBOARDING SLIDE 4 START أنشئ قائمتك القائمة فارغة تنتظر مكانك المفضل الأول اضف مكاني المفضل الأول // ONBOARDING SLIDE 4 END // PLAN YOUR DAY START // PLAN YOUR DAY END ​ // SELECT CATEGORY START الى اين اختر احدى الفئات المدعومة: صيدلية بقالة حديقة // SELECT CATEGORY END ​ // SELECT PLACE START ابحث قريب اضافة هذا الموقع موجود بالفعل في قائمة الأماكن المفضلة لديك. هل تريد المتابعة إلى القائمة؟ نعم لا // SELECT PLACE END ​ // FAVOURITE PLACES START خطط يومك الوقت الموصى به ابحث عن مكان مختلف لايوجد بيانات ليس اليوم // FAVOURITE PLACES END ​ // GRAPH START الأوقات منخفض متوسط مرتفع لايوجد بيانات قم بتنزيل تطبيق جمع البيانات الخاص بنا وساعدنا في عملنا تحميل اليوم غداً حذف // GRAPH END ​ // CUSTOM NAME START Adresa místa Pojmenujte si místo (volitelné) Přidat k oblíbeným // CUSTOM NAME END ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// // START ONBOARDING SCREEN 1 Help us fight COVID We are developing a voice-based diagnosis which could differentiate a healthy person from an infected one by listening to his cough Your help is essential in training our algorithm. We need you to record and send us your cough audio The recording is confidential and anonymous. The process takes no more than 2 minutes of your precious time // END ONBOARDING SCREEN 1 // START ONBOARDING SCREEN 2 Safe Coughing Coughing is a potentially dangerous activity, so please be very careful and protect yourself and everyone around you when you make the recordings As a strategy for safe coughing, we recommend to hold your phone at arm’s length to the right of your body, and cough into the crook of your left elbow // END ONBOARDING SCREEN 2 // START RECORD SCREEN STEPS 1. Hold your phone at arms length to the right of your body and cough into the crook of your left arm elbow 2. Press and hold start button 3. Now cough enough to record data 4. Release the start button to upload Start // END RECORD SCREEN // START DIALOG CONSENT Are you satisfied with the recording? Play Again Yes No // END DIALOG CONSENT // START DIALOG DISEASE Diagnosed with the following conditions? (if any) Chronic Lung Disease Diabetes Heart Disease Obesity / Adipositas CONTINUE // END DIALOG DISEASE // START DIALOG DRY COUGH Had a persistent dry cough in the past 24 hours? Yes No // END DIALOG DRY COUGH // START DIALOG ENTER INFORMATION Please Enter Information Age Gender Next // END DIALOG ENTER INFORMATION // START DIALOG MEDICAL CONDITION Select Your Health Status I am HEALTHY I MIGHT have COVID-19 I am COVID-19 PATIENT I am COVID-19 SURVIVOUR // END DIALOG MEDICAL CONDITION // START DIALOG SMOKE Do You Smoke? Yes No // END DIALOG SMOKE // START DIALOG SUBMIT THANK YOU Submit // END DIALOG SUBMIT // START DIALOG SYMPTOMS Please tell us the symptoms (if any) Fever Feeling Tired or Weak Diarreah Headache Lost of Taste or Smell CONTINUE // END DIALOG SYMPTOMS // START DIALOG BREATH Get out of breath easier than usually? Yes No // END DIALOG BREATH // START DIALOG CLOSE CONTACT Had close contact with a confirmed COVID case? \u2022 Living in the same apartment \u2022 Direct, physical contact (touching, shaking hands, kissing, body fluids) \u2022 Face-to-face contact, or within 1.5 meters, for longer than 15 minutes Yes No // END DIALOG CLOSE CONTACT // START EXTRA Start Stopped Uploaded Uploading... Recording... Press for longer duration!!! Successfully Uploaded. THANK YOU. Recording Started Male Female // END EXTRA // START ONBOARDING SCREEN 1 ساعدنا من أجل مكافحة جائحة كورونا نقوم بتطوير تشخيص ذاتي يمكنه معرفة مصاب كوفيد١٩ من صوت السعال سجيل صوتك أثناء السعال أو الكحة سوف يخدم الغرض من هذا البرنامج جميع البيانات مجهولة ومحفوظة بسرية لأغراض البحث العلمي // END ONBOARDING SCREEN 1 // START ONBOARDING SCREEN 2 طريقة السعال الآمنة نرجوا منك الإستعداد لتسجيل السعال أو الكحه الخاصة بك ننصح بأن تبقي جهازك على بعد ذراع تقريباً من الجزء الأيمن للجسم // END ONBOARDING SCREEN 2 // START RECORD SCREEN الخطوات 1. مد يدك اليمنى حاملا الهاتف للأعلى واستعد للسعال مرتين متاليتين 2. اضغط مع الإستمرار على زر التسجيل 3. الآن قم بالسعال 4. اترك زر التسجيل ابدء الآن // END RECORD SCREEN // START DIALOG CONSENT هل أنت راض عن التسجيل؟ التسجيل مرة أخرى نعم لا // END DIALOG CONSENT // START DIALOG DISEASE هل لديك أحد الأمراض التالية؟ مرض تنفسي أو رئوي داء السكري أمراض قلب سمنه مفرطة الإستمرار // END DIALOG DISEASE // START DIALOG DRY COUGH هل لديك سعال جاف خلال ال٢٤ ساعة الماضية؟ نعم لا // END DIALOG DRY COUGH // START DIALOG ENTER INFORMATION نأمل تعبئة البيانات التالية العمر الجنس القادم // END DIALOG ENTER INFORMATION // START DIALOG MEDICAL CONDITION إختر حالتك الصحية حالتي الصحية جيدة قد يكون لدي كوفيد١٩ تم تشخيصي بمرض كوفيد١٩ تم تشخيصي بمرض كوفيد١٩ وتعافيت منه // END DIALOG MEDICAL CONDITION // START DIALOG SMOKE هل أنت مدخن؟ نعم لا // END DIALOG SMOKE // START DIALOG SUBMIT شكراً لك إرسال // END DIALOG SUBMIT // START DIALOG SYMPTOMS نأمل إخبارنا ببعض العوارض لديك ارتفاع بدرجة الحرارة الشعود بالكسل والضعف إمساك أو إسهال صداع فقدان في حاسة الشم أو التذوق الإستمرار // END DIALOG SYMPTOMS // START DIALOG BREATH هل تعاني من ضيق التنفس هذه الأيام؟ نعم لا // END DIALOG BREATH // START DIALOG CLOSE CONTACT هل سبق تواصلت مع شخص ثبتت إصابته بكوفيد١٩ ؟ هل تعيش مع شخص ثبتت إصابته بكوفيد١٩؟ هل تتواصل مع الشخص المصاب بشكل مباشر (اللمس او المصافحة..الخ)؟ التواصل وجهاً لوجه خلال أقل من متر ونصف لمدة أطول من ١٥ دقيقة نعم لا // END DIALOG CLOSE CONTACT // START EXTRA اابدء الآن إيقاف تم التحميل جارٍ التحميل ... تسجيل... اضغط لمدة أطول! تمت مشاركتكم بنجاح.. شكرا لكم بدأ التسجيل الذكر أنثى
